医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究揭示了过敏性气道炎症的性别差异研究人员探索了性激素和染色体如何影响暴露于屋尘螨 (HDM) 的四核基因型 (FCG) 小鼠的过敏性炎症和基因表达。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-study-sheds-light-on-sex-differences-in-allergic-airway-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/New-study-sheds-light-on-sex-differences-in-allergic-airway-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34911c76-e7f6-4fa9-b8f2-aac75ef5d956 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:15:00 -0500 New study sheds light on sex differences in allergic airway inflammation
SPOC Proteomics 宣布在 SLAS2024 上推出新产品SPOC Proteomics, Inc 是一家总部位于亚利桑那州斯科茨代尔（总部）和加利福尼亚州门洛帕克的高科技生命科学公司，宣布在 SLAS2024 上商业推出可定制的传感器集成芯片蛋白质组 (SPOC®) 生物传感器，用于有限的 Beta 测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/SPOC-Proteomics-announces-new-product-launch-at-SLAS2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/SPOC-Proteomics-announces-new-product-launch-at-SLAS2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d72dde3e-​​b21a-48c2-b212-afaf474cc49c Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:04:00 -0500
Cell Microsystems 与 OMNI Life Science 宣布建立战略合作伙伴关系，为北美带来创新的细胞分析解决方案Cell Microsystems 是细胞生物学先进工具的领先供应商，很高兴宣布与德国著名细胞生物学公司 OMNI Life Science (OLS) 建立战略合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Cell-Microsystems-and-OMNI-Life-Science-Announce-Strategic-Partnership-to-Bring-Innovative-Cellular-Analysis-Solutions-to-North-美国.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Cell-Microsystems-and-OMNI-Life-Science-Announce-Strategic-Partnership-to-Bring-Innovative-Cellular-Analysis-Solutions-to-North- America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=645a42ba-5f2d-489c-8a67-fbb16a12f639 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 10:59:00 -0500
研究人员引入了准确评估胰腺细胞组成的新方法研究引入了基于 DNA 甲基化的新方法，用于准确评估人类胰腺中的细胞组成，弥补了糖尿病研究中的一个关键空白。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Researchers-introduce-new-approach-for-accurately-assessing-cell-composition-in-the-pancreas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Researchers-introduce-new-approach-for-accurately-assessing-cell-composition-in-the-pancreas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1940ed85-c23e-4faa-b7f7-507930deedcc Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:16:35 -0500 Researchers introduce new approach for accurately assessing cell composition in the pancreas
研究人员发现致命的 MRSA 肺炎如何抑制人体的抗菌活性研究人员研究了硫酸乙酰肝素 (HS) 脱落如何影响耐甲氧西林金黄色葡萄球菌 (MRSA) 肺炎中抗菌肽的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Researchers-uncover-how-deadly-MRSA-pneumonia-inhibits-bodys-antimicrobial-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Researchers-uncover-how-deadly-MRSA-pneumonia-inhibits-bodys-antimicrobial-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9886f2f-252c-493d-bd7b-c829d4fed178 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:46:00 -0500 Researchers uncover how deadly MRSA pneumonia inhibits body's antimicrobial activity
布鲁克收购 Spectral Instruments Imaging，这是临床前体内光学成像系统的性能领导者此次收购通过体内光学成像补充了布鲁克的临床前成像产品组合https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Bruker-Acquires-Spectral-Instruments-Imaging-the-Performance-Leader-in-Preclinical-In-Vivo-Optical-Imaging-Systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Bruker-Acquires-Spectral-Instruments-Imaging-the-Performance-Leader-in-Preclinical-In-Vivo-Optical-Imaging-Systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bb1f6d7-1a0e-44ce-9ba0-557ce206f972 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:44:00 -0500
Absorbance 96 Automate 揭晓：全球首款用于实验室自动化的板载读板机为了通过集成微孔板读取彻底改变自动化实验室工作流程，Byonoy 自豪地推出了世界上第一台板载读板机 Absorbance 96 Automate。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Absorbance-96-Automate-revealed-The-worlde28099s-first-on-deck-plate-reader-for-laboratory-automation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Absorbance-96-Automate-revealed-The-worlde28099s-first-on-deck-plate-reader-for-laboratory-automation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=913a97ec-7e58-473b-a925-76f7bcc21081 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:25:00 -0500 Absorbance 96 Automate revealed: The world’s first on-deck plate reader for laboratory automation
SLAS23新产品奖获得者：Absorbance 96 Automate赢得关注Byonoy 很高兴与大家分享，在实验室自动化和筛查协会年会 (SLAS23) 的重要时刻，Absorbance 96 Automate 荣获了令人垂涎的 SLAS23 新产品奖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/SLAS23-new-product-award-winner-Absorbance-96-Automate-wins-the-spotlight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/SLAS23-new-product-award-winner-Absorbance-96-Automate-wins-the-spotlight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00cd5c01-1c0e-49d0-b20e-37956650b667 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:23:00 -0500 SLAS23 new product award winner: Absorbance 96 Automate wins the spotlight
Rigaku 推出新型手持式分析仪，打击危险的非法药物供应市场Rigaku Analytical Devices 宣布推出手持式 CQL Narc-ID 1064 nm 拉曼分析仪，用于麻醉品、前体化学品和切割剂的推定鉴定https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Rigaku-Launches-New-Handheld-Analyzer-to-Combat-the-Dangerous-Illicit-Drug-Supply-Market.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Rigaku-Launches-New-Handheld-Analyzer-to-Combat-the-Dangerous-Illicit-Drug-Supply-Market.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12b8f86b-90e2-467f-8693-f587763cec45 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:23:00 -0500 Rigaku Launches New Handheld Analyzer to Combat the Dangerous Illicit Drug Supply Market
Luminescent 96 Automate 亮相：通过自动化改变发光分析Byonoy 是一家重新定义测量技术领域的新兴公司，自豪地推出了另一款创新型板载读板机 Luminescent 96 Automate。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Luminescent-96-Automate-unveiled-Transforming-luminescent-analysis-with-automation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Luminescent-96-Automate-unveiled-Transforming-luminescent-analysis-with-automation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=066145e4-b41f-472a-be42-3a23ea151376 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:20:00 -0500 Luminescence 96 Automate unveiled: Transforming luminescence analysis with automation
